children.value: Thank you for choosing Salesforce-Automation. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy outlines how Salesforce-Automation collects, uses, and safeguards your information when automating the creation of QuickBooks resources based on Salesforce data.
In order to provide our services, we may collect the following types of information:

: We may access certain Salesforce data, such as customer names, contact information, transaction details, and other data relevant to generating QuickBooks resources. This data is accessed solely with your permission and is used for integration and automation purposes.
: To generate resources on QuickBooks, we may access certain data from your QuickBooks account, such as customer information, account details, and financial data as authorized.
: When you sign up or connect your accounts, we collect account information such as your name, email address, and authentication tokens to enable secure access to Salesforce and QuickBooks.
: We may collect information about your device and how you use our app, such as IP address, device identifiers, browser type, and usage patterns to improve our services and user experience.
Salesforce-Automation uses the information we collect for the following purposes:
: To automate the creation of QuickBooks resources based on Salesforce data as authorized by you.
: To maintain, improve, and personalize our app experience and ensure optimal functionality and performance.
: To provide support and respond to any queries or issues that may arise.
: To safeguard your data, protect our app against fraudulent or unauthorized activity, and enforce our terms and policies.
: To comply with legal and regulatory requirements as applicable.
We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share information in the following cases:
: To facilitate our app's operation (e.g., cloud storage, analytics providers), provided they comply with strict data privacy and security obligations.
: When required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, or legal proceedings, or to enforce our terms of service.
: We may share information with your consent or at your direction.

We retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law. Upon your request, we will delete or anonymize your information in accordance with applicable laws and our data retention practices.

We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the use of your information in our app. You may also withdraw your consent for data processing at any time. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at
contact email or support page link

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website or app. Please review this policy periodically.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data handling practices, please contact us at:
